name: CustomRegistry
summary: Abstract base class for all scoped registries, standardizing API for storing and retrieving definitions with inheritance support.

name: HTMLRegistry
summary: Specialized abstract registry for storing constructors bound to DOM nodes, handling node upgrade and downgrade lifecycles.

name: CustomElementRegistry
summary: Replaces native window.customElements with an extended version supporting scoped registries and inheritance.

name: InjectorRoot
summary: Root container for dependency injection, handling the map of all active injectors in the DOM tree.

name: HTMLInjector
summary: Injector instance bound to a specific DOM node, providing hierarchical dependency resolution.

name: Node (Injector Methods)
summary: Adds injector hierarchy methods to Node prototype: getClosestInjector(), getOwnInjector(), hasOwnInjector(), injectors(), createElement().

name: Element.innerHTML
summary: Intercepts innerHTML setter to propagate injector scope to newly created nodes.

name: CustomContextRegistry
summary: Exposes window.customContextTypes for registering context definitions that provide hierarchical data flow.

name: CustomContext
summary: Base class for defining context providers with lifecycle callbacks and consumption tracking.

name: Node (Context Methods)
summary: Adds context methods to Node prototype: createContext(), getContext(), ensureContext(), getOwnContext(), hasContext(), hasOwnContext(), queryContext().

name: CustomElement
summary: Base class for custom elements with enhanced lifecycle and options support.

name: Node.cloneNode
summary: Patches cloneNode to preserve Custom Elements, Custom Comments, and Custom Text Nodes with their prototypes and options.

name: Element (Insertion Methods)
summary: Patches DOM insertion methods (append, prepend, after, before, replaceChildren, replaceWith) for lazy element upgrade.

name: HTMLElement Constructors
summary: Wraps native HTMLElement constructors to enable the dynamic registry system.

name: Document.createElement
summary: Patches createElement to apply correct prototypes from the patched constructors.

name: DocumentFragment.ownerTemplate
summary: Adds ownerTemplate property to DocumentFragment for template ownership tracking.

name: HTMLTemplateElement.content
summary: Patches the content getter to support enhanced template functionality.

name: CustomAttributesRegistry
summary: Exposes window.customAttributes, monitoring DOM for attribute changes and facilitating upgrade of attributes into behaviors.

name: CustomAttribute
summary: Base class for creating behaviors, similar to HTMLElement, with lifecycle callbacks for attribute-based components.

name: CustomAttributeParserRegistry
summary: Allows defining parsing logic for attribute values, enabling custom syntax and transformations.

name: CustomCommentRegistry
summary: Enables attaching behavior to comment nodes, useful for structural directives like virtual elements.

name: CustomComment
summary: Base class for enhanced comments with lifecycle callbacks for comment-based directives.

name: CustomCommentParserRegistry
summary: Parses comment content to identify and upgrade custom comments into active directives.

name: CustomTemplateDirective
summary: Base class for template directives that control template instantiation and projection.

name: CustomTextNodeRegistry
summary: Allows defining parsers for text content, enabling custom template syntax like Mustache-style interpolation.

name: CustomTextNode
summary: Base class for enhanced text nodes with reactive binding capabilities.

name: CustomTextNodeParserRegistry
summary: Manages parsers that can interpret text node content and transform it into reactive components.

name: CustomPathExpressionParserRegistry
summary: Registry for path expression parsers, standardizing how strings are parsed into executable paths.

name: CustomPathExpressionParser
summary: Standardizes how strings are parsed into executable paths for use in data bindings and expressions.

name: CustomScriptTypesRegistry
summary: Allows defining custom behavior for script tags with custom type attributes, enabling declarative scripting patterns.

name: CustomScriptType
summary: Base class extending HTMLScriptElement with lifecycle callbacks for custom script types.

name: CustomStoreRegistry
summary: Registry for state management stores, enabling reactive data flow patterns.
